★ Release Notes: 2022-05-17 ★
≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡

Thanks for upgrading to the latest version of the ALKS CLI!

* Adds a tags flag to the `createrole` option. Input format is of JSON or a shorthand syntax (Ex. 'Key=string,Value=string')
Have feedback? https://github.com/Cox-Automotive/ALKS-CLI/issues
 
☁☁☁☁☁☁  Happy Clouding! ☁☁☁☁☁☁
